wordpressPage.title: Resume EN
wordpressPage.content: Im from São Paulo, Brazil and Ive been working as a Frontend Developer for 4 years, specially with JavaScript and React. Im looking for new challenges, achievements and growth in my professional and personal life. Im an open-minded, analytical, proactive and respectful person. Im totally willing to learn new things to solve new problems and be able to build a better internet and reach other people with my work.

experience.description:
Firefly is an agency from São Paulo which works with advertisement, websites and social media. It was my first job as Developer and my duties, besides learning, were:

  • Developing themes and plugins to WordPress.
  • Building Email Marketing.
  • Transforming a PSD layout into Web Page.
  • Following the best practices on Mobile First, Accessibility, Semantic, SEO.
  • Stacks: HTML, CSS, jQuery, WordPress, PHP, MySQL Database.

Ferreri is my currently job, they are an agency with different clients and projects. I worked building a mobile app using React Native and now I’m working in a new squad, with amazing professionals, such as developers, designers, squad and tech leader. My responsibilities are:

  • Improve and maintain our platform.
  • Development of new features and correction of any bug.
  • Revising and submitting changes through pull requests.
  • Create reusable components and methods on our codebase.
  • Follow our code Style Guide.
  • Daily meetings.

Ferreri is my currently job, they are an agency with different clients and projects. I worked building a mobile app using React Native and now I’m working in a new squad, with amazing professionals, such as developers, designers, squad and tech leader. My responsibilities are:

  • Improve and maintain our platform.
  • Development of new features and correction of any bug.
  • Revising and submitting changes through pull requests.
  • Create reusable components and methods on our codebase.
  • Follow our code Style Guide.
  • Daily meetings.
  • Our stacks are NextJS, ReactJS, Styled Components, GIT, React Testing Library and Cypress.

Nexo is a company that uses AI, IoT, Blockchain, Machine and Deep Learning in their solutions. They became famous after having a profit of R$1 million in their first year. I worked to different clients and building the first Nexo own solution, besides:

  • Developing reusable React components and always improving the codebase.
  • Integrating with backend and external services.
  • Asking for help and support for any problems or impediments.
  • Working with agile method with global team.
  • Migrating an entire AngularJS’s platform into React within 2 weeks.
  • Working allocated in different clients and projects.
  • I was the only frontend developer in these projects.
  • Stacks: React, Redux, SCSS, Typescript, Git.

LaPag is a startup, winner of Visa’s Acceleration Program in 2018 and works providing solutions to beauty salons in Brazil. My duties while I was there were:

  • Mentoring junior developers.
  • Interviewing developers on our selective process.
  • Added new features and maintain our platform.
  • Fix bugs or rebuild an entire component in a better way.
  • Created a board on Trello to everyone in the company discuss topics.
  • Created our own style guide and design pattern.
  • Technical opinion on our daily meetings about our problems and solutions.
  • Stacks: Meteor, React, SCSS, Redux, NodeJS, Express, MongoDB.

I had great ideas and reasons to improve their platform but this wasn’t a priority at that time, even often talking with them. I started feeling unhappy and decided move on after 4 months.
